title: Meeting Submission Form
description: The meeting submission form guides a speaker or meeting organizer through the process of creating an event for the meeting.

sections.label: Upload
sections.description: Upload the file that represents the talk

widgets.label: File
widgets.description: Choose a file to upload that represents the talk or poster. Drag and drop the file into the box below, or press the 'Upload File' button to pick the file using a dialog box.

widgets.label: Title
widgets.description: Enter the title of the talk.

sections.label: Speakers
sections.description: Select the speakers the will be conducting the talk

widgets.label: Speakers
widgets.description: To add a speaker press the add speaker button and search for the user that will be conducting the talk. If the user does not have an account, they may be referenced by their email address. To remove a speaker, press the 'X' next to their name. Users added by email address will be given the opportunity to create a full account and will receive permissions on the talk created here automatically once they have signed up.

sections.description: Is this a poster or a talk?

sections.description: When and where is it happening?

sections.label: Submit
sections.description: Submit this talk to the meeting
